tool_description: Estimates scalp pH levels based on symptoms, product usage, and scalp condition to recommend appropriate pH-balanced products.

scalp_oiliness.description: Scalp oil production: very_dry, dry, normal, oily, very_oily

irritation_level.description: Scalp irritation: none, mild, moderate, severe

product_pH_levels.description: pH levels of regularly used products

washing_frequency.description: Hair washing frequency: daily, every_other_day, twice_weekly, weekly

hard_water_exposure.description: Whether regularly exposed to hard water

error_messages: Invalid scalp oiliness: Must be one of [very_dry, dry, normal, oily, very_oily]
Invalid irritation level: Must be one of [none, mild, moderate, severe]
Invalid pH values: Product pH levels must be between 0 and 14
Invalid washing frequency: Must be one of [daily, every_other_day, twice_weekly, weekly]
Missing required parameters: scalp_oiliness, irritation_level, washing_frequency, and hard_water_exposure must be provided
usage: Provide scalp oiliness level, irritation level, washing frequency, and hard water exposure. Optionally include pH levels of current products. Returns estimated scalp pH with product recommendations.

ph_balance_status.description: pH status: balanced, too_acidic, too_alkaline, or severely_imbalanced

recommended_product_ph.description: Ideal pH range for hair products
